original_text: When he had said these things, one of the officers standing by struck Jesus with his hand, saying, “Is that how you answer the high priest?”
korean_text: 이 말씀을 하시매 곁에 섰던 아랫사람 하나가 손으로 예수를 쳐 이르되 네가 대제사장에게 이같이 대답하느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: When he had said these things
one of the officers standing by
sentences.korean_translation: 곁에 서 있던 관원 중 한 사람이

sentences.original_text: Is that how you answer the high priest?
